sentences.en: Any violation of aforesaid obligations shall constitute responsibility subject to the applicable civil or criminal laws.
sentences.cn: 若您违反前述义务,将负担相关的民刑事责任.

sentences.en: Each of the aforesaid quantities is said to be equal or unequal.
sentences.cn: 上述的每一数量都能被等于或不等于表述.

sentences.en: His Seal of Obediance is this, the which wear as aforesaid.
sentences.cn: 这是他的封印, 佩带方式如上所述.

sentences.en: In default of the aforesaid data, no experimental animals may be used.
sentences.cn: 无上述资料的实验动物不得应用.

sentences.en: In process of time, the rain washes off all the turf and grass aforesaid.
sentences.cn: 日子一久, 经过风吹雨打,上面所说的草和草皮都被冲走了.

sentences.en: That person duly appeared among the aforesaid objectors.
sentences.cn: 这种人在刚才说过的那一班反对者中,果然就出现了.

sentences.en: The aforesaid adjustment shall be reported to the competent taxation authorities archival filing . 2.
sentences.cn: 上述调整情况,应报主管税务机关备案.

sentences.en: The aforesaid general agent agreement must contain following items.
sentences.cn: 前项总代理契约应载明下列事项.

sentences.en: The aforesaid sales agent agreement must contain the following items.
sentences.cn: 前项销售契约应载明下列事项.

sentences.en: The aforesaid series of studies shows that psoriasis is a psychosomatic disease.
sentences.cn: 这一系列研究表明银屑病是典型的心身疾病.

sentences.en: The aforesaid system effectively regulates acts of administrative law - enforcement.
sentences.cn: 行政执法责任制的推行有效地规范了行政执法行为.

sentences.en: The aforesaid total absence of conversation allowed every extraneous sound to be heard.
sentences.cn: 上边谈到的他们的默不作声使得四方传来的一声一音都可以听得见.

sentences.en: The freak worktable and unexceptionably solved aforesaid developed has solved this key problem very well.
sentences.cn: 通过研制变异工作台装置,极好地解决了超声制孔装置小型化和自动化的关键问题.

sentences.en: The invention also provides a method for producing the aforesaid composition.
sentences.cn: 本发明也提供一种制备上述组合物的方法.

sentences.en: The REIT is the key to the two problems aforesaid.
sentences.cn: 房地产投资信托恰恰可以解决上述两个问题.

trans.tran_cn: 上述的，前述的（常用于法律文件）
